oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Survey on Physical Activity - 2018
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alberta Centre for Active LIving
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Centre for Active Living administered the 2018 Alberta Survey on Physical Activity. This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore the topic in a structured research framework and environment. Research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arts and Humanities
Social Sciences
